fullscreen.title: Fullscreen
fullscreen.description: Sets the game window to fullscreen on startup

master_volume.title: Master volume
master_volume.description: Applies to all sounds in the game

aiming_style.title: Aiming control scheme style
aiming_style.description: Changes the style of aiming used between one inspired by Metroid: Fusion and Zero Mission and one inspired by Super Metroid

spin_from_jump.title: Jump to spin mid-air
spin_from_jump.description: If enabled, Samus can spin mid-air if the jump button is pressed, like in Metroid: Fusion, Zero Mission, and Samus Returns

spiderball_relative_controls.title: Relative Spider Ball controls
spiderball_relative_controls.description: Changes Samus's controls while stuck to a surface with the Spider Ball based on her orientation, instead of using static left and right inputs

spiderball_style.title: Spider Ball control scheme style
spiderball_style.description: Changes the control scheme for enabling the Spider Ball between toggle, hold, and a classic style similar to Metroid II: Return of Samus

visor_combo.title: Use combo to cycle visor
visor_combo.description: If enabled, visors will only be cycled if the visor input is pressed at the same time as the combo input

joypad_button_icon_style.title: Controller buton icon style
joypad_button_icon_style.description: Changes the style of controller icons used in button prompts (does not apply to keyboard icons)
